text: Abo abaakaafuwala ne bagamba nti: tetujja kukkiriza Kurâ€™ani eno wadde ebyo ebyagikulembera naye singa osobola okulaba ekiseera abeeyisa obubi lwe baliyimirizibwa mu maaso ga Mukama omulabirizi waabwe abamu ekigambo balikissa ku bannaabwe (ekyabasuula mu buzibu), abo abaali batwalibwa okuba aba wansi baligamba abo abeetwala okuba aba waggulu nti singa temwali mmwe twandibadde bakkirizza
